com.canabang.genietext.core.model.io.xml
Class XmlTagWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.core.model.io.xml.XmlTagWriter

public class XmlTagWriter
extends Object

Facilitates the writing of XML tags and contents to a XML TransformerHandler and Attributes handler.

Version:
1.00 2009-03-29 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

          Handles attributes to be added to a tag.

Constructor Detail

XmlTagWriter

public XmlTagWriter(TransformerHandler hd,
                    AttributesImpl atts)
Sets up the XML tag writer to use the specified handler and the attribute handler.

Parameters:
hd - The handler to use when writing XML tags.
atts - The attribute handler to use when writing the XML data.
Method Detail

writeTagAttribute

public void writeTagAttribute(String tagNameAttribute,
                              String tagAttributeValue)
Adds the specified attribute value to the specified tag attribute.

Parameters:
tagNameAttribute - The attribute name to set as the specified value.
tagAttributeValue - The attribute value to set for the specified attribute name.

writeTagContents

public void writeTagContents(String contents)
                      throws SAXException
Writes the specified contents to the open tag.

Parameters:
contents - The value of the contents to write to the open tag.
Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems writing to the output XML file.

writeTagEndElement

public void writeTagEndElement(String tagName)
                        throws SAXException
Closes the specified tag.

Parameters:
tagName - The tag to close.
Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems writing to the output XML file.

writeTagStartElement

public void writeTagStartElement(String tagName)
                          throws SAXException
Opens the specified tag.

Parameters:
tagName - The tag to open.
Throws:
SAXException - If there are any problems writing to the output XML file.
